body.name: Kenmore Aroma Control 12-Cup Programmable Coffee Maker, Red and Stainless Steel Drip Coffee Machine, Glass Carafe, Reusable Filter, Timer, Digital Display Charcoal Water Filter, Regular or Bold
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 8 hrs 50 mins
features: Large 12 Cup Capacity: Brew up to 1.8 L (1.9 Quarts) of coffee into the dishwasher-safe glass carafe, or select 1-4 Cup mode to brew a smaller amount
Pause and Pour Function: An automatic interrupter stops the coffee flow for up to 20 seconds if the carafe is removed so you can grab a quick cup without waiting for the brewing cycle to finish
Programmable Convenience: Set the timer the night before, using the simple digital controls and clear LCD display, and wake up to the delicious aroma of fresh brewed coffee

Aroma Control Brewing: When making a full pot of coffee, the 1-4 cup button doubles as a "bold" setting, slowing the water flow and steeping the grounds to bloom the flavors before releasing the coffee for a stronger, richer taste

Includes Water Purifier and Reusable Filter: 12-cup coffee maker comes with a charcoal water filter to remove any impurities from your tap water plus a reusable gold-tone cone filter that is easy on the environment and your wallet
body.description: There's nothing better in the world than that first sip of coffee in the morning, and with this programmable 12 cup coffee maker you won't have to wait. Program the brewer the night before and wake up to the delicious aroma of perfectly brewed coffee or make a fresh, hot pot with the push of a button. The dishwasher-safe glass carafe holds up to 12 cups of brewed coffee and a non-stick warming plate keeps it hot and flavorful for hours. The attractive stainless steel profile with four color options will complement any decor and the narrow profile means more countertop space. With a charcoal filter to remove impurities from the water before brewing and state-of-the-art "aroma control" brewing technology that steeps the grounds before releasing the coffee into the carafe, you'll definitely be waking up on the right side of the bed from now on. Best of all, Kenmore products are covered by a 2-year limited warranty for your peace of mind.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Brew 12 cups of fresh and fragrant coffee any time of day There's nothing better in the world than that first sip of coffee in the morning, and with this programmable 12 cup coffee maker you won't have to wait. Program the brewer the night before and wake up to the delicious aroma of perfectly brewed coffee or make a fresh, hot pot with the push of a button. The dishwasher-safe glass carafe holds up to 12 cups of brewed coffee and a non-stick warming plate keeps it hot and flavorful for hours. The attractive stainless steel profile with four color options will complement any decor and the narrow profile means more countertop space. With a charcoal filter to remove impurities from the water before brewing and state-of-the-art "aroma control" brewing technology that steeps the grounds before releasing the coffee into the carafe, you'll definitely be waking up on the right side of the bed from now on.

Brew 12 cups of fresh and fragrant coffee any time of day There's nothing better in the world than that first sip of coffee in the morning, and with this programmable 12 cup coffee maker you won't have to wait. Program the brewer the night before and wake up to the delicious aroma of perfectly brewed coffee or make a fresh, hot pot with the push of a button. The dishwasher-safe glass carafe holds up to 12 cups of brewed coffee and a non-stick warming plate keeps it hot and flavorful for hours. The attractive stainless steel profile with four color options will complement any decor and the narrow profile means more countertop space. With a charcoal filter to remove impurities from the water before brewing and state-of-the-art "aroma control" brewing technology that steeps the grounds before releasing the coffee into the carafe, you'll definitely be waking up on the right side of the bed from now on.

TIMER BREW User-friendly controls and digital display let you set the timer the night before and wake up to a pot of fresh brewed coffee AROMA CONTROL State-of-the-art brewing technology steeps the grounds before releasing the coffee into the carafe for a richer flavor 12-CUP CAPACITY Brew up to 12 cups of coffee at a time (and use the pause and pour function if you just can't wait for your first cup!) WATER INDICATOR The built in reservoir has a view-through water level indicator so you can see at a glance how much water is inside

REUSABLE FILTER Includes a washable mesh coffee filter that replaces single-use paper filters for convenience and savings GLASS CARAFE The 12-cup capacity carafe with cool-touch handle is BPA-free and dishwasher safe for hassle-free cleanup WARMING PLATE Built-in warming plate with non-stick coating keeps your coffee warm for hours and easily wipes clean CARBON FILTER Charcoal filter removes impurities from your water before brewing for the best tasting brewed coffee

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and beautiful!
reviews.reviewText: This 12-cup programmable coffee maker is a stunning red color. Easy to program. Easy to turn on and turn off. It adds a pop of color to my kitchen but also delivers exceptional performance. The programmable feature is a game-changer; I can set it the night before, and wake up to freshly brewed coffee. The 12-cup capacity is perfect for hosting guests or making a big batch for a busy morning. It's incredibly easy to use and maintain, and the coffee always turns out just right. This coffee maker has become an essential part of my daily routine, and I couldn't be happier with its stylish design and great coffee it brews.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Coffee Machine
reviews.reviewText: Love the color, works great! Has a programming feature and has been working great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great coffee pot!
reviews.reviewText: My only critique is with all the writing on the carafe. I'm right handed, so prefer to set the carafe onto its holder with handle to the right. Ugh - all I see is a ton of white writing telling me a bunch of stuff I don't need to see Every.Single.Day. All that "Caution" stuff has to be there, but would have been nice to be on the side I rarely see. Yep ... a little OCD.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this RED coffeemaker!
reviews.reviewText: We have been using it for almost a month now, after our Cuisinart died. The coffee is very well brewed as I think the hot water is more slowly infused into the grounds than with our previous maker. I love the signal at the end when finished brewing and when the maker turns off the hot plate. The glass carafe cleans easily and does not seem to stain! Also true of the basket! A really nice new item, when most new things are a disappointment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The coffee is hot
reviews.reviewText: I love this coffee maker, it not only looks great but makes great hot coffee. I never had a drip coffee maker that made hot coffee like this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I feel like I waited FOREVER for this to be in stock and it didn't disappoint. Looks great, works great. Love that the filter is built in and designed so it fits perfectly so there isn't any overflow with grounds getting into the coffee pot. Absolutely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A touch of elegance
reviews.reviewText: This coffee maker looks great, it's sturdy and easy to use ( and clean). The color red is beautiful, not too flashy. The only minor reservation is that the metal gets hot when the coffee maker is in use: just be careful!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like how it pours without dripping and makes good coffee. I wish it didn’t have such loud signals for coffee done and turning off.

reviews.reviewTitle: Vibrant Red Coffe Maker Easy to Use
reviews.reviewText: The coffee maker is quick and easy to use. The notifications for when the coffee is ready and when the coiffed maker is shutting down are very helpful.
